extendedInfo.description: Save my carrots is a game in which you'll have to face a terrible plague of moles that want to eat your carrots. Protect your friends the weasels but be careful. Some moles could be stronger than you! This little application has been developed by three friends with no experience on developing, so we hope you send some constructive critics to improve this game and release many others.Tags:Whack a mole, whac a mole, smash, whacamole, hit moles, punch moles, poke, kids.Developers:Rafael EspillaqueAlejandro MolinaJesÃºs VacasGraphics by:Cristian OsornoContact and bug report: bunkerdev@gmail.com
